languages.text: "Раз моторные вандалы сумели обуздать духов древних машин, значит, в числе их есть техноматы или даже техножрецы. Это делает их... договороспособными. Было бы эффективно использовать данных отщепенцев, а не утилизировать. Объявление награды за каждую технологию, обнаруженную ими в пустошах Даргонуса и возвращенную во владение династии, гарантирует их покорность и управляемость".

"If the Engine Vandals have managed to tame the ancient machine spirits, then that means there are technomats or even Tech-Priests among their ranks. That renders them... negotiable. It would be efficient to utilise such renegades instead of disposing of them. A promise of reward for every piece of technology found in the wastelands of Dargonus and returned to the dynasty will ensure their obedience and tractability."
languages.original_text: "Раз моторные вандалы сумели обуздать духов древних машин, значит, в числе их есть техноматы или даже техножрецы. Это делает их... договороспособными. Было бы эффективно использовать данных отщепенцев, а не утилизировать. Объявление награды за каждую технологию, обнаруженную ими в пустошах Даргонуса и возвращенную во владение династии, гарантирует их покорность и управляемость".

traits.locale_text: "If the Engine Vandals could have managed to tame the ancient machine spirits, then that means that they have the Technomats or even the Tech-Priests among their ranks. That makes them... negotiable. It would be effective to use those renegades instead of getting rid of them. A reward promised for every technology found in the wastelands of Dargonus and brought back into dynasty's domain will ensure their obedience and manageability."

"If the Engine Vandals could have managed to tame the ancient machine spirits, then that means that they have the Technomats or even the Tech-Priests among their ranks. That makes them... negotiable. A reward promised for every technology found in the wastelands of Dargonus and brought back into dynasty's domain will ensure their obedience and manageability."

It would be efficient to utilise such renegades instead of disposing of them. A promise of reward for every piece of technology found in the wastelands of Dargonus and returned to the dynasty will ensure their obedience and tractability."

languages.text: “既然那群引擎破坏者能成功驯服古老的机魂，那就意味着他们之中有技工，甚至可能有技术神甫。这样的话……值得和这些人进行谈判。如果能利用这些叛徒，这比直接消灭他们更有益处。只要他们能在达戈努斯的废土上找到技术制品，将其归还给我们的王朝，我们就会给予他们奖励，确保他们愿意服从、配合我们。”
languages.original_text: "If the Engine Vandals have managed to tame the ancient machine spirits, then that means there are technomats or even Tech-Priests among their ranks. That renders them... negotiable. It would be efficient to utilise such renegades instead of disposing of them. A promise of reward for every piece of technology found in the wastelands of Dargonus and returned to the dynasty will ensure their obedience and tractability."

traits.locale_text: “既然那群引擎破坏者能成功驯服古老的机魂，那就意味着他们之中有技工，甚至可能有技术神甫。这样的话……值得和这些人进行谈判。如果能利用这些叛徒，这比直接消灭他们更有益处。只要他们能在达戈努斯的废土上找到技术制品，将其归还给我们的王朝，我们就会给予他们奖励，确保他们愿意服从、配合我们。”

languages.text: «Si los Vándalos del Motor han conseguido controlar a los antiguos espíritus máquina, eso significa que hay tecnómatas o incluso tecnosacerdotes entre sus filas. Eso los hace... negociables. Sería conveniente utilizar a esos renegados en lugar de deshacerse de ellos. Una promesa de recompensa por cada pieza de tecnología encontrada en las tierras baldías de Dargonus y devuelta a la dinastía asegurará su obediencia y manejabilidad».
languages.original_text: "If the Engine Vandals have managed to tame the ancient machine spirits, then that means there are technomats or even Tech-Priests among their ranks. That renders them... negotiable. It would be efficient to utilise such renegades instead of disposing of them. A promise of reward for every piece of technology found in the wastelands of Dargonus and returned to the dynasty will ensure their obedience and tractability."

traits.locale_text: «Si los Vándalos del Motor han conseguido controlar a los antiguos espíritus máquina, eso significa que hay tecnómatas o incluso tecnosacerdotes entre sus filas. Eso los hace... negociables. Sería conveniente utilizar a esos renegados en lugar de deshacerse de ellos. Una promesa de recompensa por cada pieza de tecnología encontrada en las tierras baldías de Dargonus y devuelta a la dinastía asegurará su obediencia y manejabilidad».

languages.text: 「エンジン破壊者が古代の機械精霊を手なずけることに成功したのなら、奴らの仲間にテクノマットや技術司祭がいるということになる。つまり...奴らとは交渉できるということだ。そのような反逆者を処分するのではなく、活用する方が効率的だろう。ダルゴナスのウエストランドで発見され、王朝に持ち帰った技術のひとつひとつに約束された報酬と引き換えに、奴らの従順を手に入れ管理体制を強化できるだろう」
languages.original_text: "If the Engine Vandals have managed to tame the ancient machine spirits, then that means there are technomats or even Tech-Priests among their ranks. That renders them... negotiable. It would be efficient to utilise such renegades instead of disposing of them. A promise of reward for every piece of technology found in the wastelands of Dargonus and returned to the dynasty will ensure their obedience and tractability."

traits.locale_text: 「エンジン破壊者が古代の機械精霊を手なずけることに成功したのなら、奴らの仲間にテクノマットや技術司祭がいるということになる。つまり...奴らとは交渉できるということだ。そのような反逆者を処分するのではなく、活用する方が効率的だろう。ダルゴナスのウエストランドで発見され、王朝に持ち帰った技術のひとつひとつに約束された報酬と引き換えに、奴らの従順を手に入れ管理体制を強化できるだろう」
「エンジン破壊者が古代の機械精霊を手なずけることに成功したのなら、奴らの仲間にテクノマットや技術司祭がいるということになる。つまり...奴らとは交渉できるということだ。そのような反逆者を処分するのではなく、活用する方が効率的だろう。ダルゴナスのウエストランドで発見され、王朝に持ち帰った技術のひとつひとつに約束された報酬と引き換えに、奴らの従順を手に入れ管理体制を強化できるだろう」

languages.text: « Si les Vandales mécaniques ont réussi à dompter les anciens esprits de la machine, cela signifie qu'il y a des technomates, voire des technoprêtres parmi eux et cela les rend... utiles. Il serait plus efficace d'avoir recours à eux que de les éliminer... Leur promettre une récompense pour chaque babiole technologique découverte dans les terres désolées de Dargonus et rapportée à la dynastie devrait nous assurer leur obéissance et leur docilité. »
languages.original_text: "If the Engine Vandals have managed to tame the ancient machine spirits, then that means there are technomats or even Tech-Priests among their ranks. That renders them... negotiable. It would be efficient to utilise such renegades instead of disposing of them. A promise of reward for every piece of technology found in the wastelands of Dargonus and returned to the dynasty will ensure their obedience and tractability."

traits.locale_text: « Si les Vandales mécaniques ont réussi à dompter les anciens esprits de la machine, cela signifie qu'il y a des technomates, voire des technoprêtres parmi eux et cela les rend... utiles. Il serait plus efficace d'avoir recours à eux que de les éliminer... Leur promettre une récompense pour chaque babiole technologique découverte dans les terres désolées de Dargonus et rapportée à la dynastie devrait nous assurer leur obéissance et leur docilité. »

languages.text: "Wenn es den Maschinenvandalen gelungen ist, die uralten Maschinengeister zu bändigen, müssen sich Technomaten oder sogar Techpriester in ihren Reihen befinden. Und das heißt ... man kann mit ihnen verhandeln. Es wäre effizient, derartige Abtrünnigen einzuspannen, anstatt sie zu entsorgen. Man kann sich ihren Gehorsam und ihre Gefügigkeit erkaufen, indem man ihnen eine Belohnung für jede Technologie verspricht, die sie im Ödland von Dargonus finden und der Dynastie überlassen."
languages.original_text: "If the Engine Vandals have managed to tame the ancient machine spirits, then that means there are technomats or even Tech-Priests among their ranks. That renders them... negotiable. It would be efficient to utilise such renegades instead of disposing of them. A promise of reward for every piece of technology found in the wastelands of Dargonus and returned to the dynasty will ensure their obedience and tractability."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn es den Maschinenvandalen gelungen ist, die uralten Maschinengeister zu bändigen, müssen sich Technomaten oder sogar Techpriester in ihren Reihen befinden. Und das heißt ... man kann mit ihnen verhandeln. Es wäre effizient, derartige Abtrünnigen einzuspannen, anstatt sie zu entsorgen. Man kann sich ihren Gehorsam und ihre Gefügigkeit erkaufen, indem man ihnen eine Belohnung für jede Technologie verspricht, die sie im Ödland von Dargonus finden und der Dynastie überlassen."

"Wenn es den Maschinenvandalen gelungen ist, die uralten Maschinengeister zu bändigen, dann müssen sich Technomaten oder sogar Techpriester in ihren Reihen befinden. Und das heißt ... man kann mit ihnen verhandeln. Es wäre effizient, solche Abtrünnigen zu nutzen, anstatt sie zu entsorgen. Man kann sich ihren Gehorsam und ihre Gefügigkeit erkaufen, indem man ihnen eine Belohnung für jedes Stück Technologie verspricht, das sie im Ödland von Dargonus finden und der Dynastie bringen."

languages.text: "Eğer ki Makine Vandalları, kadim makine ruhlarını ehlileştirmeyi başardılarsa bu da saflarında teknomatların ve hatta Tekno Rahiplerin bulunduğu manasına gelir. Bu da onları... Müzakereye açık kılar. Bu hainlerden kurtulmak yerine faydalanmak, daha verimli olacaktır. Dargonus'un çorak topraklarında bulunan ve hanedanlığa geri getirilen her bir teknoloji ögesi karşılığında ödül verileceği sözü, itaatkârlık göstermelerini ve idare edilmelerini garantileyecektir."
languages.original_text: "If the Engine Vandals have managed to tame the ancient machine spirits, then that means there are technomats or even Tech-Priests among their ranks. That renders them... negotiable. It would be efficient to utilise such renegades instead of disposing of them. A promise of reward for every piece of technology found in the wastelands of Dargonus and returned to the dynasty will ensure their obedience and tractability."
